description: This file defines a JSONReader class for reading JSON files and converting their contents into Document objects, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous reading.

classes.name: JSONReader
classes.description: A class for reading JSON files and converting them into Document objects, with support for chunking and asynchronous reading.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Reads a JSON file or file-like object synchronously and returns a list of Document objects.

methods.name: async_read
methods.description: Asynchronously reads a JSON file or file-like object and returns a list of Document objects.
